entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Saint John
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:57 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Rain, -1.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint John Airport 07:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Rain
Temperature: -1.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 100 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -1.0°C
Wind: ESE 35 km/h gust 48 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain or freezing rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with freezing rain and ice pellets changing to freezing rain or ice pellets this morning then to rain later this morning. Fog patches developing this morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers this evening and 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023
